item.title: In Augustinian Order, Pope Leo XIV Found Unity, Charity and ‘Eternal Friendship’
item.description: The Order of St. Augustine, with fewer than 3,000 members, shaped the man who would become a cardinal, and then pope to the world’s Roman Catholics.

item.title: Outside Official Will Take Over Deadly Rikers Island Jail, Judge Orders
item.description: Laura Taylor Swain, a federal judge, seized control of New York City’s lockups, which have been rife with violence and dysfunction.

item.title: Tesla Board Chair Robyn Denholm Made $198 Million Selling Stock as Profit Fell
item.description: Robyn Denholm sold Tesla stock in recent months while Elon Musk, the chief executive she oversees, worked for President Trump and alienated many car b...

item.title: In Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’s Trial, CassieIs the Star Witness
item.description: The music mogul’s former girlfriend accused him of years of abuse in a bombshell 2023 lawsuit. Now she’s taken the stand at his federal trial.

item.title: Trump’s Plan to Take Jet From Qatar Heightens Corruption Concerns
item.description: The second Trump administration is blowing through limits on the mixing of public office and personal benefits.
